snippet: FIELD--Josh. The Board of Directors of 165 East 72nd Street mourn the loss of our President and friend, Josh Field. Josh worked tirelessly on behalf of our building. We are grateful for his efforts and for his dedication to the residents and staff. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to his family. 1/3
lead_paragraph: FIELD--Josh. The Board of Directors of 165 East 72nd Street mourn the loss of our President and friend, Josh Field. Josh worked tirelessly on behalf of our building. We are grateful for his efforts and for his dedication to the residents and staff. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to his family. 1/3
